sentences.en: a British trade mission to Moscow
sentences.cn: 派往莫斯科的英国贸易代表团

sentences.en: A powerful sense of mission underpins everything he does.
sentences.cn: 一种强烈的使命感支撑他所做的一切.

sentences.en: Even as a humanitarian mission it has been only a qualified success.
sentences.cn: 即便是作为一次人道主义行动，它也不过是取得了有限的成功。

sentences.en: Fears for the President's safety could overshadow his peace-making mission.
sentences.cn: 对总统安全的担忧可能会给他的调解使命蒙上阴影。

sentences.en: Fraser did not perform until after inter-mission.
sentences.cn: 弗雷泽直到中场休息之后才上场。

sentences.en: He accepted a com-mission as a naval officer.
sentences.cn: 他接受任命成为一名海军军官。

sentences.en: He has been on a mission to help end Lebanon's political crisis.
sentences.cn: 他已经被派执行一项旨在帮助结束黎巴嫩政治危机的使命。

sentences.en: He was charged with an important mission.
sentences.cn: 他受委托承担一项重要使命.

sentences.en: He was sent on over 200 missions before being killed in action.
sentences.cn: 在阵亡之前他奉命执行过200多次军事任务。

sentences.en: I must forget these side issues and remember my mission.
sentences.cn: 我必须忘掉这些枝节问题，记住我的使命。

sentences.en: I reside at the mission at St Michael's.
sentences.cn: 我住在圣·米歇尔教堂的传道会里。

sentences.en: I'll leave you to undertake an important mission.
sentences.cn: 我要让你承担一项重要使命.

sentences.en: She was sent on a special mission to Belgrade.
sentences.cn: 她被派往贝尔格莱德,负有特殊使命.

sentences.en: The mission was attended upon by many risks.
sentences.cn: 这一使命带有许多风险.

sentences.en: There is an enormous sense of mission in his speech and gesture.
sentences.cn: 他的一言一行都带着强烈的使命感。

sentences.en: US troops taking part in the peacekeeping mission

phrases.tran_cn: 经营使命，出差；企业代表团
情况考察；真相调查团；实况调查组
太空航行地面指挥中心
不可能的任务，棘手的任务
营救任务，救助任务；抢险救援任务
贸易代表团；贸易访问团

trans.tran_cn: 代表团，使命，官方使命，布道所
trans.tran_en: an important job that involves travelling somewhere, done by a member of the air force, army etc, or by a spacecraft

trans.tran_cn: 给…交代任务，派遣，把任务交给，向…传教
